title: Check for Website Mobile-Friendliness
description: An SEO specialist needs to check if a website is considered mobile-friendly by Google.

tasks.description: Get the URL of the website to be tested.
Use Google's Mobile-Friendly Test tool to analyze the URL.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inputs the URL into the tool.

tasks.description: Review the results to see if the page passes the test and identify any reported issues (e.g., 'Clickable elements too close together').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a clear pass/fail result and a list of any specific mobile usability problems.
